title: Chroma Gifting
body:
My Friend DogMaDoge, wants a chroma for his birthday, which is soon. but sadly i cannot gift him a chroma he likes. Please Riot, As a suggestion Could you please add this feature in the next patch? 
Much Appreciated. 
-AlphaBeatz101

replies.body:
Is this an issue with the new client?  Because i have gifted my friend Garen chroma skins before simply because he hates Garen. 

I believe the chromas were just under the gift skin option?  

It has been awhile since I've done this though so things may have changed?

This feature would allow the easy use of gifting chromas to friends or family. Sending RP, in a sense, would be giving them more RP than they need as you can only send set limits of RP. Whereas, if you could just simply purchase a chroma by itself and send it to your friend, it would be a lot more beneficial and less money waste.
